CustomField.formula: DK_Driver_Assigned__r.FirstName + ' ' + DK_Driver_Assigned__r.LastName + '^' + Assigned_DK_Driver__r.FirstName + ' ' + Assigned_DK_Driver__r.LastName +'^' + TIP_Team_Manager__r.FirstName + ' ' + TIP_Team_Manager__r.LastName +'^'+ TIP_Coordinator__r.FirstName + ' ' + TIP_Coordinator__r.LastName
CustomField.label: DK Driver Names
